data.message: This profile pic is of a woman claiming to work for you guys and that you're awarding money to Facebook users and that you have to have $300 up front to collect. I always thought if you win something you pay later. I got a messenger from her today and unfriended her because out of nowhere she Friend me on Facebook. I am skeptical

replies.message: Hey Shacheen, this sounds like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1O7WkGh. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Abby
I message this to your site and never got a response although you state responses within an hour. I screen saved her Facebook page and messaged it to facebook
Facebook Why are you not responding to my message??I see you respond to others but not to me...Have send an PM also but no answer back...
